post:
[Abc-hosters.com](http://www.abc-hosters.com) is adding a new line of service to our lineup. Our new OpenVZ NAT VPS service is being launch with servers in France to start off with and more data centers to be added. We are proud of this new service and want to let LET know about it.

**Limited Stock at this time!!!!**

**France StarterVZ Nat Plan:**
<br />Unmanaged
<br />1CPU Core (Shared fair use)
<br />128MB RAM
<br />128MB vSwap
<br />20GB Disk
<br />Unmetered Bandwidth (Shared fair use)
<br />19 NAT IPv4 Ports + 1 SSH Port
<br />OpenVZ/ProxmoxCP

**OS:** CentOS 6, Debian 7, more OS added!!! 

Price: **$2.95**/Per Year [Order Link](http://www.abc-hosters.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=45)

Payment Options: Paypal and Credit Card

**Website:** [http://www.abc-hosters.com](http://www.abc-hosters.com), [About Us](http://abc-hosters.com/about.html)
